IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PREVENTION OF CHILD ABUSE AND NEGLECT BY OFFERING SERVICES THAT PROMOTE CHILD SAFETY AND FAMILY STABILITY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: PREVENTION OF CHILD ABUSE AND NEGLECT BY OFFERING SERVICES THAT PROMOTE CHILD SAFETY AND FAMILY STABILITY.
IRS990.Description: CRISIS NURSERY: THE SHELTER SERVED 283 CHILDREN FOR THE FISCAL YEAR 2009- 2010. 210 WERE UNDER THE AGE OF 5. THE SHELTER PROVIDED A TOTAL OF 12,636 BED NIGHTS, 43,808 MEALS, AND 36,500 SNACKS.

Activity2.Description: THE NURSE FAMILY PARTNERSHIP AND RAISING HEALTHY KIDS PROGRAM, FUNDED UNDER FIRST THINGS FIRST, PROVIDED HOME VISITATION SERVICES TO FAMILIES WITH CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 5. NURSE FAMILY PARTNERSHIP (NFP) RECRUITED FIRST TIME MOTHERS DURING PREGNANCY AND PROVIDED HOME VISITING BY NURSES UNTIL THE CHILD TURNS THE AGE OF 2. NFP SERVED 70 FIRST TIME MOTHERS. RAISING HEALTHY KIDS PROGRAM PROVIDED HOME VISITATION AND FAMILY SUPPORT TO 130 FAMILIES WITH 231 CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 5.

Activity3.Description: FOSTER CARE RECRUITMENT AND TRAINING: WE RECRUIT, TRAIN, MONITOR AND SUPPORT FOSTER FAMILIES IN PIMA COUNTY. THE FOSTER CARE PROGRAM PROVIDED SUPPORT TO 125 FOSTER FAMILIES WHO SERVED 598 CHILDREN.

ActivityOther.Description: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES: BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES (BHS): UTILIZING EASTER SEALS BLAKE FOUNDATION, PRESIDIO COUNSELING AND OUR FAMILY SERVICES AS QUASI-PARTNERS, WE PROVIDE A COMPREHENSIVE CONTINUUM OF BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES TO ELIGIBLE CHILDREN BIRTH THROUGH 22 YEARS OF AGE. BHS SPECIALIZES IN SERVING THE UNIQUE NEEDS OF CHILDREN IN FOSTER CARE. IN OUR FIRST 3 MONTHS OF OPERATION, DURING 2009-2010, WE SERVED 260 CHILDREN. SMART SUPPORT: SMART SUPPORT PROVIDES MENTAL HEALTH CONSULTATION TO LICENSED CHILD CARE FACILITIES IN PIMA COUNTY. THIS SERVICE IS PROVIDED UNDER A SUB-CONTRACT AGREEMENT WITH EASTER SEALS BLAKE FOUNDATION.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION INTENDS TO USE ANY INVESTMENT EARNINGS FROM THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS TO CARRY ON THE PRINCIPLE ACTIVITIES OF THE ORGANIZATION. THE PRINCIPLE BALANCE WILL REMAIN AS PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED FUNDS UNLESS SUCH A TIME ARISES THAT THE ORGANIZATION CEASES BUSINESS. AT THAT POINT THE FUNDS WOULD BE USED TO SETTLE ANY FINAL COSTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ANY SIGNIFICANT NEW PROGRAM SERVICES NOT LISTED ON A PRIOR RETURN
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: NEW PROGRAMS IMPLEMENTED BY CASA DE LOS NINOS DURING FISCAL YEAR 2009-2010 WERE BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES (BHS) AND SMART SUPPORT.

OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES: BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES (BHS): UTILIZING EASTER SEALS BLAKE FOUNDATION, PRESIDIO COUNSELING AND OUR FAMILY SERVICES AS QUASI-PARTNERS, WE PROVIDE A COMPREHENSIVE CONTINUUM OF BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES TO ELIGIBLE CHILDREN BIRTH THROUGH 22 YEARS OF AGE. BHS SPECIALIZES IN SERVING THE UNIQUE NEEDS OF CHILDREN IN FOSTER CARE. IN OUR FIRST 3 MONTHS OF OPERATION, DURING 2009-2010, WE SERVED 260 CHILDREN. SMART SUPPORT: SMART SUPPORT PROVIDES MENTAL HEALTH CONSULTATION TO LICENSED CHILD CARE FACILITIES IN PIMA COUNTY. THIS SERVICE IS PROVIDED UNDER A SUB-CONTRACT AGREEMENT WITH EASTER SEALS BLAKE FOUNDATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD FUNCTIONS AS THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND REVIEWS THE PRELIMINARY FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING WITH TAXING AUTHORITIES.

BOARD MEMBERS ARE ANNUALLY ASKED TO UPDATE THEIR STATEMENT OF BUSINESS RELATIONSHIPS AND INDICATE ANY THAT COULD POSE A POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST WITH THEIR ROLE AS A BOARD MEMBER OF CASA DE LOS NINOS.

BIANNUALLY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS RELEVANT LOCAL, STATE AND NATIONAL SALARY INFORMATION FROM THE DEPT. OF LABOR. SALARY RANGES ARE DESIGNED FOR ALL SALARIED EMPLOYEES INCLUDING THE EXECUTIVE STAFF. RANGES INCLUDE LOW, MID AND MAXIMUM LEVELS BASED ON EXPERTISE, EXPERIENCE AND EDUCATION.

BIANNUALLY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS RELEVANT LOCAL, STATE AND NATIONAL SALARY INFORMATION FROM THE DEPT. OF LABOR. SALARY RANGES ARE DESIGNED FOR ALL SALARIED EMPLOYEES INCLUDING THE EXECUTIVE STAFF. RANGES INCLUDE LOW, MID AND MAXIMUM LEVELS BASED ON EXPERTISE, EXPERIENCE AND EDUCATION.
GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC THROUGH OTHER WEBSITE, WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG, AND UPON REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION IS INCLUDED IN AN AUDITED COMBINED FINANCIAL STATEMENT PREPARED IN ACCORDANCE WITH GAAP.
